definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
(arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.english: Their franc is the most expensive currency on our list.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它們的瑞士法郎是我們列表中最貴的貨幣。

sentences.english: Every hiccough of our sewers costs us a thousand francs.
sentences.chinese: 陰溝每打一個噎，就耗費一千法郎。

sentences.english: Price in Swiss Franc (CHF or SFr), Tax included.
He kept the sixteen sous, and handed the five francs to the young girl.
sentences.chinese: 他留下了十六個蘇，把五法郎給那姑娘。

sentences.english: He has a little room on the Rue Condorcet for which he pays sixty francs a month.
sentences.chinese: 他在孔多塞街有一問小房子，每月付六十法郎房租。

sentences.english: Nestlé sales for 2010 were almost CHF 110 bn.
sentences.chinese: 雀巢2010年銷售總額將近110億瑞士法郎。

sentences.english: He drew as much as two thousand francs a year from it; this constituted nearly the whole of his fortune.
sentences.chinese: 他因而每年能掙兩千法郎，這便是他的全部家產了。

sentences.english: The ancient painting was purchased for 50,000 francs in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 那幅古畫是一九八九年以五萬法郎買下的。

sentences.english: He wasted a tolerably large allowance, something like three thousand francs a year, in doing nothing.
sentences.chinese: 他無所事事地喫着一筆相當大的學膳費，三千法郎。

sentences.english: At that moment, he had three francs left.
sentences.chinese: 而在當時他只剩三個法郎了。

sentences.english: Monsieur Lefevre used to give him twenty thousand francs a month.
sentences.chinese: 以前勒菲弗先生每個月給他兩萬法郎。

sentences.english: He paid twenty francs for the cast-off garments.
sentences.chinese: 他出二十法郎買了那身短命衣。

sentences.english: With poetic justice, the crisis recoiled against Paris and destroyed the franc.
sentences.chinese: 老天有眼，這場危機反倒使巴黎和法郎受害頗深。

sentences.english: He drew two five - franc pieces from his money-bag and handed them to the priest.
sentences.chinese: 他從他錢袋裏取出兩枚五法郎的錢，交給神甫。

sentences.english: Good gracious, yes, sir, it is twenty-three francs.
sentences.chinese: 聖母，是啊，先生，是二十三個法郎。

definition: krone (currency of Norway, Denmark, Iceland and Sweden) (loanword)
écu (French coin, discontinued by the end of the 18th century)
